page.title: 15HOMES TO RENT,DUNDONALD
page.content: In Dundonald, as well as very attractive private homes, there are many houses which can be rented from the Local Council or from the Scottish Special Housing Association. The Council houses are built on the eastern side of the Main Street and are mainly semi_detatched villas with a few blocks of terraced houses as well. The houses are built in different sizes to suit large and small families and the average rent is about Â£40.80 paid fortnightly. The S.S.H.A. houses were built around 1970 to provide homes for workers in the new factories built around the village,providing employment locally. Lots of new people moved into the village around that time many of them from Glasgow.These houses are built in long terraces, traffic free, at the top end of the village.
